headline: Is Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Akamai Technologies is priced attractively today, you are not alone. This article will help you weigh what the current share price might be implying. The stock closed at US$98.66, with returns of 5.5% over the last 7 days, 11.6% over 30 days, 15.9% year to date, 13.0% over 3 years, a 1.0% decline over 1 year and an 11.6% decline over 5 years, which gives investors mixed signals on how the market has treated the company recently.
